name: Material (04)
description: Documentation of the exhibition Material I curated about viewing art online and collecting art digitally @ Welcome Screen, London 28.11.14-04.01.15. Also on Instagram @materialpunk.  Material opened two days after a show titled Hike, Hack / Hic et Nunc @ XPO gallery, Paris, which specialised in digital art.   More info: http://thecomposingrooms.com/2014-material.html
